classical_calcvar.d: Euler-Lagrange equations, necessary conditions, sufficient conditions, Hamilton's principle, and classical variational techniques.

direct_methods.d: Lower semicontinuity, coercivity, weak convergence in Sobolev spaces, existence theorems via minimization.

regularity.d: Regularity of minimizers, partial regularity, De Giorgi–Nash–Moser theory, Schauder estimates.

geometric.d: Minimal surfaces, harmonic maps, geodesics, curvature flows, Plateau problem, geometric measure theory.

optimal_control.d: Pontryagin maximum principle, dynamic programming, Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman equations, viscosity solutions.

convexity.d: Quasiconvexity, polyconvexity, rank-one convexity, relaxation of variational problems, Young measures.

gamma_convergence.d: Gamma-convergence, homogenization, dimension reduction, variational limits of sequences of functionals.

optimal_transport.d: Monge-Kantorovich problem, Wasserstein distances, Brenier's theorem, displacement convexity, gradient flows.
